identity.mission: Create a healthcare platform that feels like a wellness sanctuary, not a hospital database.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix medical precision with botanical warmth.
Emotion First: Every screen must reassure and guide.
Content is King: Data must be legible, actionable, and human.
Zoom In: Focus on the patient's immediate needs.
Negative Space: Let the data breathe.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.html: <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@300;400;600;700;800&family=Public+Sans:wght@300;400;500;600&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400;0,600;1,400&display=swap' rel='stylesheet'>

usage.h1: font-heading font-bold text-4xl md:text-6xl tracking-tight text-primary-900
usage.h2: font-heading font-semibold text-3xl md:text-4xl tracking-tight text-primary-800
usage.caption: font-sans text-sm text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wider

colors.description: A grounded palette that mixes clinical precision with organic warmth. No generic hospital blues.

accent.description: Electric Ochre/Coral for high-priority CTAs only.

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky headers, floating action bars, toast notifications.

dashboard_grid.name: The Control Room
dashboard_grid.usage: Main dashboard view. Use col-span-12 for KPI strip, col-span-8 for main charts, col-span-4 for lists.

marketing_grid.name: The Tetris
marketing_grid.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 md:gap-12 p-8 md:p-12
marketing_grid.usage: Landing page. Asymmetrical layouts. Leave empty cells for breathing room.

buttons.primary: bg-primary-600 text-white hover:bg-primary-700 shadow-soft hover:shadow-hover rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary-100 text-primary-900 hover:bg-secondary-200 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary-200 text-primary-700 hover:border-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-50 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300

cards.dashboard: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 shadow-soft p-6 hover:border-primary-100 transition-colors duration-300
cards.feature: bg-secondary-50/50 rounded-3xl p-8 border border-transparent hover:border-secondary-200 transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-primary-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-100 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 transition-all duration-200

hero.alt: Modern doctor using tablet for consultation

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text meets APCA standards. Use text-slate-900 for main text on light backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Modern Clinic' color palette immediately.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to index.html.
3. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn components for complex logic (Forms, Dialogs) but style them using the 'cards.dashboard' and 'inputs.default' classes defined above.
4. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard. Do not use a single column layout for data.
5. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
6. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., data-testid='submit-prediction-btn').
7. VOICE: For the voice bot, use a subtle pulsing animation (using CSS keyframes) to indicate listening state.
8. CHARTS: Use Recharts (via Shadcn charts) with the semantic colors defined in the palette.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No centered text blocks without purpose.
Use 2-3x more padding than you think is necessary.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use #1C1917 or #0F172A.
Always handle loading states with skeletons, not spinners.
